Carbox is a sandbox Driving game.
With its easy-to-use editor, you can create customized maps and circuits to explore and race.
Build your own city, share it with the world, and race in an ever-expanding library of community generated maps.

description: Guide Kairo throughout this exciting and challenging metroidvania adventure. Defeat enemies, solve mysteries, learn skills and restore peace back to the kingdom of Haamit.

name: Unto Deepest Depths
description: A dark fantasy strategy game where you must build a party and lead them into the unknown to vanquish the horrors below. Battle through turn-based combat, upgrade your units, and plan your moves carefully in this punishing roguelite where any move could be your last.

name: Island Dwellers
description: Island Dwellers is a calm, turn-based strategy game where you guide a small island tribe through the challenges of rising sea levels. Manage your growing population, gather resources, and explore new islands to secure the future of your tribe.

name: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
description: A dragon's breath turns you into a stickman! Conquer castles, plunder territories, or lead your squad in this fantasy world! During your journey, you can explore various dungeons, discover hidden treasures, engage in trading, farming, craftmaking and more. Will you survive and regain your true self?

name: Project Ethos
description: Project ETHOS is a free-to-play, 3rd-person roguelike hero shooter.

name: Last Helion
description: Last Helion is a bounty hunting extraction shooter with short, intense play sessions. Take down wanted fugitives across procedurally generated worlds. Battle warring factions and bosses to secure valuable loot. Craft gear, build your ship, and upgrade your character to tackle bigger challenges.

name: Dimensional Double Shift
description:
From the creators of Job Simulator comes an all new omniversal hand tracked cooperative multiplayer game: Dimensional Double Shift!

Assemble a team of up to 4 friends to run the Gas N’ Grill, an omnidimensional diner and garage. Work your hardest to please your “helpful” AI manager ALICE, or ignore her — she’s only a hologram. Fix, refuel, shred, smash, and torch as you help the citizens of the omniverse. The balance of floating roadside convenience rests in you and your friends’ hands!

name: ElePass: Only Elephants Can Unlock the Passcode
description: This is an action puzzle game for 1 to 2 players that can be played on a single smartphone. You play as the main character, an elephant who has picked up a smartphone, using a finger shaped like an elephant's trunk. There are also special elephant rings to set the mood.

name: Depth Loop
description: Sin descripción

name: Primal Force Arena
description: Primal Force Arena is a sci-fi, online competitive multiplayer game that lets players engage in fast-paced tactical turn-based battles, infused with action-packed elements and RPG touches. Embody your favorite Primal Masters, hone your tactics, enhance your equipment, and ascend to global dominance through thrilling game modes!

name: Streets of Handbags

name: Orrery
description: Put the solar system in your pocket! Orrery is an astronomy/astrology app that lets you crank through time to see accurate projections of where planets were or will be on specific dates.

name: Rap Uncle
description: This game features an old man who misunderstands rap and puns, so you'll have to poke fun at him. Swipe according to the icons displayed on the screen to make a tsukkomi. If you make quick hits, you will get a lot of chicks (scores).

name: Planet Strike
description: Experience the ultimate cosmic billiards. Solar winds that accelerate planets with intrusion. Asteroids decelerating on impact. Lead the planets of the solar system to the black hole by utilizing various devices placed in the field.

name: Rewild
description: Fight your way through enemies and solve world-puzzles in Rewild. An Action-RPG where you play as someone trying to solve world problems and help others.

name: Backrooms Cleanup Crew
description: Backrooms Cleanup Crew is a fresh combo of cleanup simulator and fast-paced action, all set in the liminal halls of the Backrooms

name: Stellagate
description: Stellagate is a puzzle action with gates that can connect different locations. The connected areas are seamlessly connected to each other, and you are free to throw blocks or lasers through them.

name: Time For Bed
description: It’s all over if mom catches you playing video games past bedtime. Pretend to sleep through this nightmare, avoid mother’s surveillance, and complete the game at hand.

name: Grimstone Survivors
description: Grimstone Survivor is a unique 3D top-down roguelite genre adventure that immerses you in the heart of a fantasy world. You must hone your combat skills and think strategically to survive in this world full of dangerous creatures.

name: Ritual Chamber
description: Dive into the depths of Hell's Vestibule as a gunned Ritualist. Fight off roaming scores of monsters by empowering your firearms with spells and Rituals in a fast-paced dungeon crawler roguelike.

name: Skykipelago
description: Skykipelago is a chill strategy game where you build happy little cities in the sky. Explore a variety of colorful islands, care for your buildings' happiness, evolve your buildings to help you grow, and when solid ground is no longer cool enough for you - expand onto the cliff sides.

name: Savara
description: In this colorful action roguelite, participate in the festivities organized for the pleasure of the warrior god. Equip your best weapons, prove your valor against powerful monsters, and permanently engrave your name in history!

name: Rollin' Gun
description: The world moved on, rebuilt from the ashes of a war long forgotten. But some battles never end. An old war hero—scarred, forgotten, but unbroken— rolls into town, ready for one last fight. Bound to a wheelchair but still a force to be reckoned with, he takes up arms once more to protect a land that no longer remembers his name. Face relentless waves of supernatural foes, as an aging gunslinger who refuses to lay down his arms in this low-fantasy Western with unique challenging controls.

name: Tuff Stuff

A new adventure - inspired by Ape Escape!
Help Ronny and Bri catch these adorable stuffed animals that have suddenly come to life. FYI, they're really aggressive for some reason. So maybe not so adorable? Go get 'em.

name: Rodea Eternal
description:
This is a fangame based on Yuji Naka's game "Rodea the Sky Soldier" for the Wii.

You control a flying robot named Rodea through levels made of floating islands. You can fly freely simply by pointing and clicking. Explore or speedrun as you like, defeat enemies, and reach the goal.

name: Light Switch Simulator
description: Light Switch Simulator is a casual, massively multiplayer simulation game where players engage in the ancient battle between light and dark. Players can choose from three factions, unlock light switches, and compete or collaborate online in an MMORPG environment. The game emphasizes simple mechanics of turning lights on and off, with options for single-player or multiplayer modes. Special features include private rooms, cross-platform multiplayer, and Steam achievements.

name: The Lady, The Mage, & The Knight
description: Developed by Larian Studios, a tech demo was released at E3 2000 of the cancelled isometric RPG and later released as part of GOG's Divinity campaign. Gameplay focused heavily on the individual talents of these three protagonists, and puzzles, pitfalls and all kinds of tricky situations were solved by cleverly using their unique abilities.

name: Funbox Ultimate Slots Bundle
description: Get ready to spin and win with the Ultimate Slots Bundle! Includes Celebrity Slot Machine, Tasty Slot Machine and Lucky Slots.

name: Noiramore Academy
description:
On the cold planet of Noivesse lies a school with a dark and storied history called Noiramore Academy. Judith Hovern, one of the talented students attending this institution, is a troubled but wickedly smart student who has an interest in discovering the forbidden secrets of the school. When one of the new teachers is violently kidnapped during the night, and Judith is the only witness, she must use her wit, powers, and puzzle-solving skills to illuminate the identity of the culprit and save the school.

Noiramore Academy is a 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore the storied halls of the school, talk with interesting characters, and unlock the secret of the mystery plaguing the school.

name: Need 4 Meat
description:
10,000 B.C. Primitive man walks the earth, proud but vulnerable. His only desire is that most scarce and precious resource: MEAT.

Take up your spears and establish yourself as the true apex predator. Pick off skittish rabbits if you can. But beware the crafty wolves, who pursue rabbits and humans both. For all are made of meat, and must return to meat in the bitter end.

Will the hunter become the hunted? Will you finally succumb to the relentless logic of natural selection? Or will you finally fulfill your….NEED 4 MEAT?

name: Bundle of Joy
description: Bundle of Joy is a lighthearted, story-rich, minigame romp about becoming a parent during the pandemic. Complete all your child-rearing tasks, manage your stress, find time to rest, survive the day, wake up, and do it all over again. It won't be perfect, but that's ok. You're doing your best.

name: Graceborne
description: ﻿Graceborne is a mod overhaul heavily inspired by Bloodborne, its main goal is to turn Elden Ring's base game into a more grim and sinister experience through multiple means.

name: Dark Dynasty: The Siege of Londor
description:
Take control of an ancient warrior from the era of the Three Kingdoms and lead your armies, the dragons, the Abyss Watchers, and the Outrider Knights against the forces of Londor. Join the Shu or Wei dynasty in a conquest for land. Or, take Londor for yourself by joining swords with the Mercenaries. Lore and story is a new twisted end to the Souls series.

This mod is an overhaul of most things in the game. Completely changes the way you play the game with super poise and sweeping attacks. Game progresses in a completely new storyline and map layout. You are an ancient hero, and it's about time you acted the part. You will face a new kind of challenge, unlike any seen in the Souls series. Strategize, and use the new spells and abilities to unleash chaos unto your enemies.

Quick romp through the world of DS3. Utilizing underused areas of the game. Play with your current character if you like, you will only miss the firelink shrine lead up. Armour resistances are much more important in this game. Upgrading the new weapons is integral. Leveling helps a lot more due to weapon scaling. Don't forget: you can retreat from a battle to upgrade.

name: Hollow Overhaul
description: Overhaul mod for veterans, with new balance, less bonfires, atmosphere lighting, new enemy placements, bosses, items, spells, shiny red blood, new status effects and many others core changes in gameplay.

name: Dark Souls III: Born From the Ashes
description: Mod aims is to make game significantly harder by adding a lot of enemies around the dark souls world, providing more build possibilities and balancing NG+7, new weapons and armors with brand new powerful skills and passives, better HUD and many more.

name: Honey Pot
description: Dive into the immersive world of 'Honey Pot,' a cooperative action-strategy VR game where you and your friends become bees defending the hive from bears on the hunt. Fly, gather honey, construct turrets, deploy stingers, and use bow and arrow attacks in a frantic battle to protect Queen Bee Melli's domain. Team up, strategize, and save the hive in this thrilling VR experience!

name: Mecha Macho
description: Mecha Macho is an action/platform video game, in which you play as Luchin, a 3-year-old baby that is the reincarnation of the legendary wrestling champion "El Super Macho". You will travel through the universe in your robot suit to avenge his death, and recover his champion belt using wrestling techniques and powers, that you start to remember as you make your way through the game

name: Pia
description: "You have stepped on a landmine. How will you handle it?" This game challenges you to disarm a landmine using a multi-key input system, simulating the tough situation. By aligning the character's situation with the player's actions, it offers a unique experience. Using a pedal controller enhances the realism. Can you successfully disarm the landmine and survive?

name: Dream in the Shell
description:
When a black sphere appears on Earth, countless people become trapped in endless dreams. The protagonist's wife is among them, compelling him to venture into the dangerous sphere to save her.

'Dream in the Shell' is a story adventure game that explores surreal worlds where dreams, memories, and the subconscious blend. Explore mysterious spaces through unique interactions and uncover the truth.

name: Cyber Parkour
description: Cyber Parkour is a PVP mobile racing game with fast-paced gameplay. Race as a Cyber Runner on side-scrolling tracks, dodge obstacles, and use cyber abilities to win! Collect various runner skins and accessories along the way. Break free from the System and race through neon buildings to become the champion in Cyber Parkour.

name: Dashy Crashy 100
description: Start your engines and outrun 99 racers in a thrilling knockout race. 100 start. Only 1 survives. Lightning-fast reaction-racing with a 100-racer twist. Party up with friends, master simple tap controls and test your reflexes on choas-filled highways as you try to boost and bash your way to 1st place. Let's DASHY CRASHY!

description: Aldian of Ancients is a dinosaur multiplayer simulation/survival game aims to recreate the world of yore filled with creatures that defy comprehension.

Experience dynamic shifts between top-down and third-person views, deep customization, and epic battles across universes in this action roguelike survival game.

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Season 2: Empire Resurgent
description: Prepare for an epic new Season of Star Wars: Hunters, 'Empire Resurgent’. Imposing Imperial security droid K-A0S storms into the Arena, ready to unleash her powerful Tank-class abilities. Season 2 also introduces a thrilling new battlefield inspired by Darth Vader’s iconic castle, plus an all-new Arena Pass with cosmetics, stickers and more to be unlocked.

name: AI People
description: AI People is a sandbox game where you create and play your own scenarios with unique AI-powered NPCs that learn and interact based on your decisions. Their behavior is not scripted and their Large-Language-Models with Long-Term-Memory allows them to really think, feel and feel alive.

name: High Spirits
description: Drink potions while you banish ancient spirits and recover your memories of the night before. In this roguelite you'll recruit dysfunctional companions, collect strange ingredients, and concoct wicked brews.

name: Elixir Emporium

Unleash your creativity in a world of infinite crafting and endless adventure.

Engage with dynamic NPCs, create unique items, and explore a truly responsive, magical world where every choice shapes your journey in a myriad of ways.

New game data generates as you play based on the actions you take, so you'll never run out of new things to discover.

This Sonic Mania mod aims to be a mod that doesn't play nor feel like Mania at all, hence the old PC-Monochrome-like style used for the whole game.
You simply shoot things that comes at random and aim for the best score you can do !

name: Petrichor
description: PETRICHOR is inspired by the frantic, explosive gameplay of shoot-em-ups and run-n-guns from the 80s and 90s combined with a sense of sprawling adventure and exploration. You take on the role of The Spaceman, a mercenary sellship on a quest to discover the mysteries of the dread moon Petrichor. You will face hoards of possessed robots and hostile wildlife as you navigate six levels toward the moon's core where you must defeat the haunted supercomputer that controls the ruined alien facility built here thousands of years ago.

name: Pirofauna
description: Burn, little Flame, burn... Light up the misty forest, dispel the darkness... Let tiny bugs emerge from the nooks and crannies, gazing at your spark.

name: Omut
description: A punishing fever dream combining abject terror, dark comedy, and many, many deaths.

name: Saudade
description: Cross through the barren landscape looking for a big enough rock to throw yourself of off. Point and click in post-apocalyptic Galiza through a cooking game with only one recipe.

name: Animals & Coins
description: Join players around the globe in this animal adventure game. Build treasure islands and bridges, raid your friends’ bases, collect coins, unlock new pet characters, and go on a journey to explore the legendary animal kingdom!

name: The Game of the Goose
description: The Game of the Goose is a historical racing game for two to eight players. It is a chaotic game of luck in which players take turns rolling dice in an attempt to reach the center of the board by exact count. Winning and losing are never certain. Unlucky players will lose turns or be pushed back, but players who land on the spaces bearing geese can cross the board quickly.

name: A.L.I.G.N.E.D
description: Line up matching pieces in rows or columns to delete to delete them and clear the board.

name: Gates of Migad
description: Gates of Migad is set in medieval Northern Europe. Through the protagonist's travel perspective, it presents a panoramic view of the Nordic culture and the times, explores the conflicts behind countless myths, and gives players a deep experience of "role-playing and immersion".

name: Theta and Paralldoxs on Worldlines
description: In this puzzle game, you can use a fork that can split yourself to create a variety of unimaginable "Paralldox"s.

name: Fated Land
description: This is a Pixel Tactical Self-Propelled RPG Games The battle system adopts a semi-turn-based design, Quick Battle or Enter the Battlefield? It's time to decide! In this journey full of magic, you will also meet a variety of characters, who may become your allies, or your partners...

name: Operation: Polygon Storm - The Train
description: The Train DLC expands the base game, introducing a new map centered around the Train and its theme. Get ready for a challenging battle with multiple choke points, cover opportunities, new units, and updated models for existing soldiers.

name: Brewed Horizons
description: Design your boat, tailor a drink menu fit for royalty and serve drinks while navigating through the kingdom. Explore the high seas with your boat! The islanders need a ferry, and he kingdom needs you to uncover the mystery of the Coffee Queen's disappearance!

name: Ourlands
description: Ourlands is a cozy island builder where you craft bespoke little lands for friendly little Islanders.

name: Blood & Play
description: Hot single vampires in your area wanna give you the SUCC?! Blood & Play is a gay T4T visual novel about a guy who just lost his job in the tech industry and the centuries-old vampire who's willing to buy his blood. A deal this good can't actually be real, right...?

name: Bit Esc
description: Break free from the system in Bit Esc, an action/adventure platformer where Bit sets out to escape from the tyrannic OS. Explore the digital world, overcome frantic challenges, meet new friends and make tough decisions that’ll determine the fate of Bit and the world around them.

name: Wasteland
description: Arcade style Top-Down 2D Zombie Shooter

name: Sonic Limitless
description: Sonic Limitless is a 2D modern fangame that aims to recapture the gameplay found in Generations.

name: Sonic Mania: Colorful Encore
description: Colorful Encore is an enhancement project for Sonic Mania Plus focused on reimaginated or revamped palettes for Encore Mode. Some of them were reworked from scratch with original themes, others are enhanced versions of the originals. It also improves some sprites and other visual assets.

name: Kyle & Lucy: Wonderworld
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Stranded
description:
Sonic faced many dangers before, but now, he will have to face a new one... hunger. In this 3D, Adventure-like game, Sonic will be stranded on a deserted island and it's up to him to build a settlement and find other castaways, who were prisoners on Egg Carrier before it crashed. And most important, survive. However, the island has keys to many mysteries, including origins of the original Phantom Ruby...

This 3D Sonic fangame is style of Sonic Adventure is aiming to create engaging level design with dozens of alternate paths and zero boost pads. This game brings Classic-like physics which can be used to reach new paths, elemental shields, new Special Stages, multiple playable characters with unique abilities designed with S3&K/Mania/Advance philosophy and heavy focus on story.

name: Sonic Metal Adventure
description: Welcome to Sonic Metal Adventure! A 2D platformer similar to Sonic Rush with Dreamcast era graphics and music.

name: Fate Trigger: The Novita
description: Fate Trigger: The Novita is a 3D Anime-style, hero-based tactical shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5, available across multiple platforms. Dive into a dynamic world of floating islands, become a sharpshooter with extraordinary special skills, craft your own strategies, and engage in thrilling, spectacular life-or-death showdowns!

name: VGMQ: Video Game Music Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Doces Santos o Jogo
description:
Doces Santos: The Game is a delightful experience that captures the joy of preparing treat bags for the feast of Saint Cosmas and Saint Damian!

With an intuitive interface, players must check the candy demand for the bag and, with a simple tap on the screen, drag the candies into the bag. It’s a fun way to celebrate this tradition!

this game was made in the brazilian nacional museum

name: Everglyph Trials

name: Holospecter
description:
Deep underground lies a secret facility. An organization seeking to strengthen humanity in a world that is becoming ever increasingly harsh. Like many of the subjects, Samantha waits locked away and guarded. Tested on against her will.

However, a day comes when her cell door mysteriously unlocks. The lab is devoid of all life and its subjects have been left in solitude. The question is why? What lies in wait in these emptied halls?

name: Aunt Emily
description: Your aunt, Emily, just died. Being her only relative alive, her house in the small town of Broken Falls now belongs to you. But there's a catch: her ghost still lives within the house and will not leave for the afterlife until the mystery of her death is resolved. With help from FBI agent Desmond Miles, it's up to you to find out what happened to your aunt.

name: Army Moves Overdrive
description: Reboot of the 1986 classic from Dinamic. Aimed at modern players, in this reinterpretation of World War II, we take control of Derdal, a special operations team soldier, with a variety of gameplay types and many surprises.

name: Cornbread PNG
description:
In "CORNBREAD PNG" you will be challenged to maintain your balance as you walk across narrow beams, over city streets, deep crevasses, and other environments. Be careful not to rush, or you may lose your footing, but don't hesitate for too long - the beam may just slip out from under you.

This game is designed to be challenging. It will test your willingness to endure stress and your patience.

There is no save feature, but there are "safe" areas where you can go to rest before you take on the next beam. The game is complete when all beams have been crossed.

name: Don't Mind Liam
description: In this narrative-driven psychological horror game, Andrew, the neighborhood babysitter, has been asked by his parents to watch their friend's son, Liam, whilst they go out for the night. Being seventeen, and not minding spending his Friday night making some easy cash, he accepts... but Liam is no ordinary child.

name: Eruption Imminent
description:
Eruption Imminent tells the story of Ashe, a 20-year old futanari, who is struggling to find her bearings in life.
She works a boring job, she never had a relationship and she's constantly battling with her own insecurities. And then there's the upcoming return of someone she once was very close with...
Dealing with long kept secrets, past trauma and forbidden desires, things start to slowly spiral out of control.

name: Another Random Idle RPG
description: ARI is a browser RPG game, where you have to manage a team of heroes to defeat a dungeon full of monsters

name: Lost in Hieroglyphs: A Hidden Objects Expedition
description: Hidden Object Discovery: Find hidden objects in ancient locations and reveal lost treasures. There are a total of 180 hidden objects in 6 chapters.

name: Tampopo
description: Tampopo is a heartfelt RPG adventure with unique physics-based combat. It is set in a strange world with strange characters. It is a lighthearted game that will make you laugh but it has a hidden darkness to itself which will gently unfold until it wraps all the way around you.

name: Echo Chess
description: Daily chess online game.

name: No, I'm Not A Human
description: An intimate story about a disaster and guests from underground. People are breaking into your home, but not all of them are true people.

name: Deadzone: Rogue
description: Deadzone: Rogue is a roguelite first-person shooter set in deep space. Slay hordes of enemies, loot powerful gear, and customize your loadout during each unique run. Uncover fragments of your past as you piece together the truth behind your mission. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat.

name: Sonic Adventure Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Adventure SX
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic NG
description: Sonic NG is a fan-made game in the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. Players control Sonic and possibly other characters as they speed through levels inspired by classic Sonic games. The game likely features fast-paced platforming gameplay, with Sonic running, jumping, and spin-dashing through various environments. Sonic NG may incorporate both 2D and 3D elements, blending traditional side-scrolling sections with more modern 3D gameplay. As a fan creation, the game probably aims to capture the essence of classic Sonic titles while introducing new elements or improvements. Sonic NG might include original levels, characters, or gameplay mechanics designed by fans to expand upon the established Sonic formula. While not an official Sega product, Sonic NG represents the ongoing enthusiasm of the Sonic community for creating new experiences within the beloved franchise.

name: Sonic Districts
description: Sin descripción

name: Allegro: The Melodic Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: The Big Blow Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Frost
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper's Quest Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper's Quest: Mystic Warp
description: Sin descripción

name: Undesired Catch
description: Drive your boat through a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape and try to find all the pots to return home. Something is waiting for you hidden under the water.

name: Boulder Dash: 40th Anniversary
description: Embrace Rockford's roots and celebrate 40 years of the iconic game Boulder Dash. Relive iconic moments from the past and experience the legendary puzzle game like never before. Don't let time stand in your way – come back in time with us and relive those unforgettable moments today!

name: Dash Cats
description: Sin descripción

name: Temporal Shift: Flow of Eternity
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Sketchhog: Episode 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Emerald Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories of a Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
description:
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas is an unreleased racing game based on the movie of the same name for the Sega Dreamcast. The game was developed by Full Fat and set to be published by Swing! Entertainment in late 2000. Despite being based on the live action movie, the game itself had a cartoony artstyle which is more in line with the show rather than the series of movies.

The game was later cancelled and another racing game based on the movie was later released instead in 2001 exclusively for the PlayStation 2.

name: Aliens
description: Aliens is an unreleased Sega Genesis game based on the movie of the same name. The game was set to be developed by Konami and was going to be a port of the arcade game, although never released for unknown reasons.

name: Tintin on the Moon
description: In September 1992, a port of Tintin on the Moon for the Sega Master System was set to release, however due to quality concerns relating to the port the game was delayed to a January 1993 release before being cancelled.

name: Astral World
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic The Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic AGES
description: Sin descripción

name: Petit Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Islands
description: Sin descripción

name: Guess the Intro
description: Guess the Intro is an unreleased mobile game by Spotify. The game was a music quiz where players had to guess what the song playing is based on the intro alone. Not much is known about the game apart from it's listing in the TestFlight Teraleak.

name: Hit the Button
description:
Hit the Button is a platform game in which the main objective is to press all the buttons in each level. It is a game comprised of jumping and platforming, puzzles and brain teasers.
Each level presents a challenge as it has different design ranging from easy levels where you will have to perform simple jumps and difficult levels with more complex jumps, with puzzles and riddles.

name: Lobstpurr
description: A clicker game, with a 3d multiplayer function.

name: Festibattle
description: Sin descripción

name: Shoshin Test
description: Become a subordinate of Detective Gumshoe and take an ability test. Register your grades in the ranking and compete with detectives nationwide for status!

name: Low-Budget Repairs
description: Manage renovations in 90s apartment blocks! Focus on quick profit and cut costs wherever possible. Client notices defects? Tough luck, the money's already in your pocket. Every day brings new challenges and decisions that can lead to fortune... or trouble!

name: Forsan El Majd
description: Forsan El Majd ( Knights of Glory ) is a strategy game played on the Internet browser and mobile devices. The game tells the story of the Islamic conquests in Persia, Africa, and Europe.

name: Attack on Titan Tribute Game 2
description: A free-to-play game developed by a team of volunteers as a successor to the original "Attack on Titan Tribute Game" created by Fenglee. Based on the anime "Attack on Titan", the game revolves around high speed movement using the 3DMG gear.

name: To Bring Her Back
description: To Bring Her Back is all about solving riddles. Unravel mystic poems to discover the correct combination of symbols to draw, and summon demonic creatures that can aid two friends in their dark quest.

name: Shining Lore
description: Shining Lore is a cancelled Xbox and PC MMO.

name: DC Super Hero Girls: Food Fight
description: Help the DC Super Hero Girls in this food fight face off against Poison Ivy, Cat Woman and Harley Quinn. Throw food at your opponent and collect power ups.

name: Diffusion
description: Diffusion is a total-conversion mod in its own universe, based on Half-Life SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.

name: Baroque Darts
description: Baroque Darts is a darts game in the baroque serie for i-mode and EZplus, distributed by Sting Station.

name: Gioventù Ribelle
description:
Gioventù Ribelle is a freeware FPS videogame published for the celebrations of the 150th anniversary of the Unification of Italy.
Made by Gruppo di Filiera dei Produttori Italiani di Videogiochi in collaboration with various government institutes, the game follows a young soldier in 1870 who, after recieving an order from General Raffaele Cadorna, needs to travel towards Rome in order to get a message to Pope Pio IX; during his journey the young Bersagliere will need to fight the Palatin Guard and the Pontific Army.

The game has only one level where you fight against enemies using a variety of weapons: a musket, a Colt Navy and a Chassepot rifle.

name: Vampires Fable
description: Vampires Fable is a coop, adventure, story-driven game for two players, combining the best of escape room games, puzzle games and arcade games. None of the players will be able to solve the puzzle alone. Whether you manage to find your way back to each other depends only on your communication.

name: Mirage 7
description: Mirage 7 is a dark fairytale, a third-person adventure with a unique blend of fantasy and sci-fi. The young Nadira travels the desert with her pet lizard companion Jiji, searching for a lost oasis - where she hopes to find a way to save her sister.

name: Life Without You
description: Life Without You is a simulation of sitting at the computer, immersing you in the harsh atmosphere of Patience.

name: Stargate Network
description: Fan-made video game (fangame) based on the Stargate franchise. Explore Stargate Command, the Pyramid of Abydos as well as pilot a Puddle Jumper and more.

name: Broadtrip
description: Furry RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

name: ChromaZone
description: ChromaZone is a game about a man just taking a casual walk around his home island Prismara Isle although suddenly an unfamiliar Robot native to the island appeared before him with his flying saucer-type machine he flew with. he morphed his body into a ball-like shape as he would fly away turning his friends into more or less puppets.

name: Pillow Legends and The Last Nugget
description: A platformer in which you can spend time alone or with friends.

name: Biophage
description:
You are a single-celled organism.

Climb walls and ceilings, and find new ways to build up and maintain speed!

Punt your enemies into the air and finish them off with a grab and slam!

Explore the strange ecosystems laid out in your path, and feel the essence of nature!

name: Untitled Experimental Platformer by KG
description: A 2D platformer where you'll be able to explore an open world, use different double jump types to tackle different levels, and be able to make your own route through the game.

name: Yaysuu's X-Treme Adventure
description: Yaysuu's X-Treme Adventure is a side-scrolling 2D Platformer starring YAYSUU the Stickling, and his older brother Teddy.

name: Xenogunner Returns: Rule of Chaos
description: A fast-paced boss-focused action platformer!

name: Worlde Lande Countrie
description: World Lande Countrie is a 2D platformer game about strange-looking blokes doing strange things.

name: Girl Who Shrunk the Neighbors
description: On the weekend your neighbor's step sister invited friends over to his step mom's house so they can all meet up. When they played music, you and the other neighbors didn't like it and complained. At your neighbor's home with your girlfriend, all of you then suddenly get shrunk to the size of bugs.

name: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu
description: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu is an open world ARPG game that includes real-time combat, dating development, and multiple plot side options. Its unique feature is that the combat system adopts a rare move mode in RPG genre, hoping to bring players a different experience.

name: Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074
description: "Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074"is a text-based visual novel game with a sci-fi and suspense theme. After an unprecedented disaster caused by an accident, the future of humanity seems bleak. Until April 9, 2074, a pivotal event that would shape humanity's fate occurred……

name: Toshokan de ha Oshiuka ni.
description: Build various builds by combining stolen books, fire guns with loud explosions, sneak into the library that changes every time you enter, and steal the legendary old book from the head librarian who sits at the far end of the library!

name: Cursor Kingdom
description: "Cursor Kingdom" is a medieval fantasy-style tower defense strategy game. Plan and use your cursor resources wisely to build defenses and repel the invading goblin hordes, protecting your kingdom!

name: The Throne of the Monster
description: The Throne of the Monster is a female protagonist fantasy-style AVG.You will play a "monster" trapped in the human world and embark on an adventure in order to escape.Cities in chains,human beings without tears,betrayals of a thousand years ago...Finally, judge the pale world of love and hate.

name: Canis Major Alpha
description: This is a story about finding courage. You will play and control two elves exploring the inner world of a girl named Ming, who suffers from depression. As you collect items to find the courage, the story of Ming gradually unfolds...

name: Touhou Seisenei: Forlorn Souls of Wicked Past
description: Join Gensokyo's strongest line of defense to protect the realms against a sudden incredible swarm of human souls! Inexplicable in origin, play as Reimu Hakurei, Marisa Kirisame, and Ichirin Kumoi to search for the source of this skirmish, putting an end to it before time runs out for good...

name: Shinde Shinde Tsuyoku nare!...?
description: A deadly RPG with a new system that makes you stronger by dying and suffering.The graphics are a combination of dots and 3DCG, and the scenario is massive and branching. No matter how many times you die. No matter how many times you die. Don't give up hope.

name: Star Fire
description: This rogue-like action game will get your adrenaline pumping, combining exhilarating combat with deep strategic building! Every adventure is a brand-new beginning, you'll unlock new talents, hone your skills, and create powerful skill combinations to destroy groups of monsters ultimately! Ready？

name: Fallen Deities
description: Fallen Deities is a multiplayer PVE game for 1 to 4 players. The player takes on the role of a Fallen Deities agent who travels to the location where Deities has appeared, players can uses various items to determine the identity of Deities, also develops the correct method to capture the Deities

name: My College Picture with Them
description: My College Picture with Them is a short galgame game produced by Tsukino Shosha, which showcases the relaxed college life through the stories of two female protagonists and resolves the conflict between the" playing house style "within the student union and the club.

name: My Strongest Girlfriend
description: "My Strongest Girlfriend" is a super-popular card competition game. Here, you will meet hundreds of beautiful girlfriends with unique personalities and characteristics. They will accompany you on this journey full of fantasy and surprises. adventure journey.

name: Pingcheng Chronicles
description: Pingcheng Chronicles: Pioneering the ARPG Genre with Chinese-Style Battle Royale and Entwined Partnerships[

name: Mystic Explorer
description: Mystic Explorer is a treasure rogue game. Players will play the role of treasure hunter in search of treasure chests in the siege of monsters, defeat the ever stronger enemies, and bring back your own archive treasures.

name: PsychoCudgel
description: Umm… Just a 3D precision platformer game about Journey to The West. Might be a bit difficult.

name: Blind Date Simulator
description: A role-playing game where players will interact with various female characters and try to find their true love from them.

name: Magic Realm
description: The story of Magic Realm begins in a small town nestled in a dangerous misty forest, where a series of mysterious events take place that propel the protagonist to the town's hidden truth.........

name: Spiritual Bond: Breaking the Curse, Intertwining Fates
description: “Anyone who is destined, please help us....” A text-based puzzle game themed around shrine Miko. Explore an abandoned village, ancient and mysterious shrines, and eerie sacrificial rituals by combining nouns and verbs. Gradually uncover the truth hidden behind the story.

name: Lost Dream Chronicle
description: "Lost Dream Chronicle" is a 3D ARPG that combines campus simulation with a 3D sandbox Metroidvania. The story follows a young adult, "Xiao Nan," who after graduating from university, enters society as a high school chemistry teacher, only to find herself trapped in dreams.

name: Tricky and the Dream Caster
description: Tricky and the Dream Caster is a movement-centered collectathon that aesthetically takes after Sega's ill-fated final home console. Control Tricky O'Possum and his new morally ambiguous pal Volt as they traverse the astral plane to break free of Dream Caster's curse!

name: TeknoKinetica
description:
High speeds and faster times are the name of the game! TeknoKinetica is a 2D speed-running oriented platformer built for those who like to retry and optimize! Utilize the power of Parries and Rhythm to blitz through bite-sized stages in speed and style!

You'll need a good dose of speed and quick-wits to make it through with a high rank. Think you got what it takes, accelerator?

name: Deer Avenger 2
description: Sin descripción

name: SyS KillMirror
description: An exploration FPS set on a fake planet called SyS, ruled by the cat named Emperor, will you be able to escape this cursed realm?

name: Superguy and Megaboy
description: Superguy and Megaboy is a high-speed, free-roam platformer that is somewhere between 2.5D and 3D. Players can attack only on a 2D axis but otherwise move freely in 3D. Attacks will only hit their targets if they are positioned at roughly the same 3D depth.. meaning if you see a bad guy in the distant background, you won't be able to hit him (or vice versa) unless you move up close!

name: Scouter
description: Welcome to Scouter! A fast-paced action platformer oozing to the brim with 90's anime goodness! This is a really fast-paced action game where your goal is to get to the end and fight as many enemies (and be as stylish) as you possibly can!

name: Welcome to Sushi Tree
description: A fast paced game inspired by Wario land 4 and pizza tower that puts a lot of focus on story and uniqueness of each level.

name: Time of Sorrow
description: Sin descripción

name: Skyfarm
description: Skyfarm is a cozy single-player 3D farming simulation game, set on a post-apocalyptic rooftop and based on permaculture principles. Tend to your garden and create self-regulating ecosystems to harvest food and increase biodiversity. Talk to fellow rooftop gardeners and unlock new elements.

name: Proto Sonic
description: Sin descripción

name: Trio Triado The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: The New Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
description:
The New Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog is a fangame based on Sonic Cartoons & Archie Comics.
The Game itself takes place in a special Alternate Universe where elements of all three shows (SatAM, AoStH & Underground) co-exist in some kind of fashion. You have a choice to play through 3 zones in this demo; Peridot Coast (a beach in Mobius best known for it's unusual green sand), Marble Valley (a canyon filled with volcanic geysers) & Robotropolis (an industrial city & Primary headquarters of Bumbling villain Dr. Robotnik & his Super Sonic Search & Smash Squad!

name: Infinity Wanderer
description: Infinity Wanderer is a roguelite, souls-lite action-platformer. Players dive into Lunara's dark story, facing her fears in a nightmare world. With handcrafted levels and deep character customization, it offers fluid, challenging combat that blends fast-paced and strategic souls-like mechanics.

name: Blob the Klex
description: Step into paws of Klex and use your cat powers to explore the charming town of Katzburg in this 3D platformer, Blob The Klex!

name: Mysterious House
description: a mysterious house waits you!

name: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game
description: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game is a LCD game based on the original 2003-2013 Australian adaptation of Deal or No Deal.

name: Girlvania Expansion Pack: Legs & Feet
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Dash
description: Shadow Dash is a retro 2D action platformer with pixel-art characters on oil painting backgrounds and changing game controls.

name: Hydra
description: Hydra is a detective game with survival horror elements. You have been sent to the island of Kanaan to find an abandoned research facility of the "Third Reich". The island is also a place where terrifying creatures come out of the dark sea.

name: SplatShop-2D Thunderstorm
description: SplatShop-2D, a young game developer, finds Castlestorm, a highly-ambitious yet unreleased old game. However, the game was slowly being corrupted by assets from other games, so 2D solves it the only way he can... Mass Destruction!!

name: Super Nova
description: Welcome to Super Nova! A 2D fast-paced platformer with emphasis on keeping your speed, quick combat, and bosses that will keep you on your toes to beat 'em up!

name: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet
description: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet is an endless boss battle arcade platformer. It's about you, an ever-changing boss, and tons of projectiles. Choose a character, get as many points as you can, and work towards unlocking more characters.

name: Super Freaks Side Story: Scruffy Minus - The Rise of the Anti-Freaks
description: Bringing back the gameplay style of Scruffy 3: A Day in the Life, Scruffy Minus is a new platforming adventure (with some freaky surprises!) Run, jump, and activate your different superpowered Suits, to kick butt!

name: Super Freaks Presents: Strato Freaks 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunrise Doll
description: Sunrise Doll is a single-screen 2D game in which you control the swordsman known as Pawn. The goal of the game is to clear all levels in a sequence. To clear a level, Pawn must defeat all enemies in the level. To defeat an enemy, Pawn must use her sword to reflect projectiles back at it, and then collect its soul. There are various enemies that have different behaviors.

name: Stardust the Unicorn
description: A small platformer inspired by old-school speed games. Help Stardust rescue his friends from the Kelpie Kingdom using his speed, horn, and magic dusts that grant him different abilities. Jump around, run, and use your abilities to advance through the levels. Watch out for obstacles and use different dusts to help you progress. Different dusts grant you different powers, which you can use to your advantage. Try them all and use your favorite one.

name: Starbot: Asvertichaos
description: Starbot: Asvertichaos is a fast-paced 2D platformer focused on fluid movement. Explore the continent of Asvertica and uncover its secrets as you explore every crack and crevice while meeting a wacky set of characters to find your friend!

name: Speel
description: Speel is an experimental typing game that plays a little more like a puzzler. Your job is to type words incorrectly on purpose.

name: Super Mario Land 2 + Wario's Conquest
description:
Super Mario Land 2 is back!
Relive the golden days in this remake of a classic- spiced up with lots of new features!

name: Speedy the Rollerskater: SMS Edition
description: Speedy the Rollerskater SMS Edition is a demake of Speedy the Rollerskater using the Open Surge Engine. Besides fixing some issues of the original version, Speedy SMS Edition offers a 'What If' scenario...

name: Sollire
description: Sollire is a Gradius-style Shoot Them Up combined with bits and pieces inspired by Sonic, Megaman and Zelda.

name: Smitty 2
description: Smitty 2 brings back the adorable platforming adventure into a brand new level! Walk, hop and sprint through the interconnected areas around Dripsdale and search for Dropple Capsules and Energy Pellets scattered throughout.

name: Runaway Star
description: Runaway Star is a classic turn-based RPG inspired by games like Pokemon Mystery Dungeon and Final Fantasy. Explore the world of Raffelsia where falling stars with dangerous monsters inside have begun to plague the region. Join a team of adventurers called the Diurners and work together with new friends to uncover the source of the phenomenon and bring a stop to it.

name: Knight Legacy
description: A new journey across the Kingdom Of Kavasia awaits you in Knight Legacy! Become a true knight, fight against evil foes and help people with many side quests.

name: Making a Monster
description:
Loupe is an aspiring witch who wants to make an elaborate training dummy to help them hone their magic skills. Instead, they make something worse.

A micro visual novel about facing your worst enemy.

name: Rolling Ball Game DX: Director's Cut
description: Rolling Ball Game returns with Rolling Ball Game DX: Director's Cut! Traverse through obstacles and avoid the capsule-bots trying to knock you off the stage. Featuring all new and remastered levels, alongside extra content.

name: Werewolves Revenge
description:
Werewolves Revenge is a first person social deduction game where your voice is your greatest weapon.

The Town must work together to identify and eliminate the Werewolves before it's too late..

The Werewolves secretly meet at night, allowing them to scheme and attack a player.

Neutrals, loyal only to themselves, find their place in the chaos.

Played by up to 16 Players, games are filled with deceit, murder and plot twists.

name: Sonic: The Secret Tracks
description:
It's time to get Funky!

Sonic and Secret Tracks is a Sonic themed overhaul of the popular Rhythm Game of Friday Night Funkin. A collaborative effort between Sonic fans in order to bring a fun, radical experience by the mania for the mania.

name: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party
description: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party is a collection of mini-games featuring classic Sonic and teenage mutant ninja turtles from the animated show from the 80s! In these mini-games you will need to collect a certain number of points. Their total number is rated S or D rank, depending on how many points you have collected. In this demo, you will be able to run at super sonic speed as Sonic and kick some shells as Leonardo! At different levels from the games of both franchises, you will meet Dr. Eggman's badniks and Shredder's foot soldiers (and not only)!

name: Sonic Velocity
description: Sonic Velocity is a 3D Boost formula hedgehog game in the vein of Sonic Unleashed and Generations.

name: Sonic Unleashed +
description: Sonic Unleashed + (Plus) is a sonic fan game that aims to port Sonic Unleashed to PCs.

name: Sonic Tameshi
description:
Sonic Tameshi is a Classic Sonic Fan Game created on the Sonic Worlds engine.

The game's story follows Sonic after he finds out about Dr Eggman's new plan to extract all the natural resources from an Mystical island. Face Metal Sonic and save the island, stop Eggman from building the Pleasure Island Theme Park and save the beautiful paradise hidden on the other side of the sea. Sonic will feature the Drop Dash, Insta-Shield, Peel Out and a Wall jump!

name: Sonic Sunsation
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Skyfall
description:
From Stick Drift Studios comes Sonic Skyfall, a brand new Sonic fangame being made with the Infinity Engine framework, taking inspiration from Unleashed, Colors, Generations, and Frontiers! The very first demo is now playable, featuring the first 4 levels of the game. Each can be played as either Sonic or Shadow, and both hedgehogs have their own collectibles to find. Explore the Atlas Sky Islands in Nanite Nimbus Zone and enter the Liminal Spaces: pocket dimensions that somehow emits familiar energies.

Both Hedgehogs each have one new ability/quirk added to them to mix things up a little. Sonic still has his Bounce Bracelet as his Air Special, but can now also utilize a new Ground Special Ability called the Cylaunch. As the name implies, it is based on the Cyloop from Sonic Frontiers, except it sees Sonic instantly launching himself high into the air, while also being able to take out closeby enemies on the ground. This ability will drain 10 units of Sonic's Boost/Energy Meter, so use it with caution! Shadow's Chaos Control is his Special Ability, which also costs 10 Energy. Not only does Shadow slow down time, but he also reduces his own gravity by a very noticeable amount. With proper use of this perk, Shadow can reach unthinkable heights while cutting down times! Both characters can also fire a projectile that seeks closeby enemies at the cost of 3 Energy. Shadow will fire a Chaos Spear, and Sonic will launch a Sonic Boom Shockwave.

name: Extreme Air Snowboarding 3D
description: You have to take part in competitions in extreme winter sport. You can choose kind of competitions. It can be downhill, slalom or you can do various tricks in freestyle. No matter what kind of tournament you choose, you will enjoy excellent 3D graphics in all of them!

name: Sonic Return of Fire Breath
description: Sin descripción

name: Chrono Crimes
description: Mystery-Time Travel Deduction Game with Stealth & Puzzles

name: Sonic Re;Velocity
description: A 2D Sonic fan game with a heavy focus on high-speed momentum and stupidly fast platforming, with a simple control style, a unique gameplay style and a strange emphasis on going as fast as hedgehogly possible.

name: Sonic Momentum
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Magenta
description: Sonic Magenta is a free 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fan game made by Scorbunny Channel.

name: Sonic Jam Game.com Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Into Cyberspace
description: Sonic Into Cyberspace is a 2D modern Sonic game that aims to evolve and expand upon the 2D Sonic formula. This game places an emphasis on freedom of movement and flow, maintian high speeds to enter boost mode to go even faster and collect rings to reduce the amount of time to enter boost mode.

name: Sonic Grind
description: Sin descripción

name: Rebellion Stryker
description: Gun your way through this cyberpunk Run-n-Gun with never-before-seen hand-drawn graphics! Pick between two characters and even play co-op in this arcade title!

name: Karaoke Joysound for Streamer
description:
"Karaoke Joysound for Streamer" offers unlimited singing of tens of thousands of songs that can be live-streamed and video posted!
In addition, there is a scoring game, a singing key change function, and a lyrics message display function, all of which are well-known at karaoke parlors.

name: Rave Rough!
description: Rave Rough is a comedic and chaotic puzzle platformer about chucking your exposable vinyl collection to bounce your way throughout many platforming challenges! All the while butting heads with wacky friends and foes! Levels are very open ended and the moveset compliments this, with you having a lot of freedom to tackle challenges in all sorts of different ways.

name: Mighty Metas
description: “Mighty Metas” is an action-packed game where players battle using slash, shield slam, and stab moves. Each action has a counter, demanding quick reflexes and strategic thinking. With diverse characters and stunning environments, the game offers fast-paced, thrilling combat that keeps players hooked

name: Project Rodeo
description: Project Rodeo is a proof of concept for a 3D platforming adventure game starring Rodeo, a bat living in an old western/steampunk fantasy-styled world who sets out on a grand adventure throughout the known islands. Inspirations for the game include the Mega Man Legends series, Grandia, Tail Concerto and The Legend of Zelda series.

name: Aim Assault
description: Step into the nostalgia-fueled world of Aim Assault, the ultimate VR rail shooter.

name: A Gravity Conspiracy
description: A Gravity Conspiracy is a FPS/3D Bullet-Hell game with dynamic gravity. Fight like hell on all surfaces in an intense single player campaign.

name: Agni: Village of Calamity
description: Agni, a determined investigator from a covert Indonesian police unit who defied orders and ventures into a remote village despite ominous warnings. What begins as an unauthorized investigation quickly plunges Agni into a horrifying reality

name: Age of Enlightenment
description: Shape the destiny of the world as an 18th century ruler. Forge alliances and prepare your armed forces to expand your domain and colonize new lands. Or focus on internal development and help your subjects thrive with prudent economic policy and lawmaking. The choice is yours in Age of Enlightenment!

name: Aetherdale
description: Fight your way through the magical kingdom of Aetherdale in this roguelite, collecting powerful weapons and artifacts along the way.

name: Aetherian Chronicles
description: Aetherian Chronicles is a 3D Casual SideScroller MMORPG focused on interaction with AI controlled players. Explore, train, party up, make friends and trade with real people or AI controlled players! Customize your character to your hearts content and choose your own way to experience your adventure!

name: Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon
description: In the enchanting world of Aetheria, three fairy warriors are on the cusp of graduating from their academy when their city is suddenly attacked. Embark on epic quests and missions to uncover the source of the darkness threatening their land.

name: Adrift
description: Drift away in the serenity of the desert. Untwine a labyrinth abyss and find oasis’s to unwind. Unveil a forgotten land sand swallowed. But remember, once you finally get lost, ADRIFT, just you, a truck and nothingness, it marks the arrival to the beginning, from here, you start to find your way.

name: A Developer Nightmare
description: You’re stuck in a dream and must run a special program on your computer to escape. Anomalies in the house disturb you, increasing your stress. Work with 2 or more Players to clear them before your stress consumes you.

name: Abyssal Wrath
description: Abyssal Wrath is a frenetic, merciless top-down shooter, set on a eldritch science fiction universe.

name: Abducted
description: Play as the socially rejected host of ETRadio, desperate to discover alien life while being mocked for answering hoax sighting calls - until one turns out to be terrifyingly real. When the call comes in, will it be the air that goes dead - or will it be you?

name: 90s My Dear
description: This is a farm simulation management game, where players will play as a little boy who travels back to the 90s. Characters from classic movies and TV shows from the 90s will interact with you, helping them unlock various clearance items and restore our familiar world.

name: 7 Nights Keeper
description: In 7 NIGHTS KEEPER, take a job to watch over a mansion for 7 nights and uncover a horrifying secret: the elderly occupant is possessed by a demon. Survive the escalating terror and keep the darkness at bay, or become its next victim.
In the year 2184, in the dystopian city of Neo-London, Hope, a young girl from the prole class, fights for her freedom under the oppressive watch of the One Party.

name: 15th Prison
description: There is no way out of this prison. But examine your surroundings carefully, do not ignore any abnormalities. Take the envelope given to you by the block officer and proceed, there may be an escape route. Your carelessness may result in death.

name: Shattered Souls
description: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned, and you will not forget the betrayals inflicted upon you. With a mark that ties your fate to seven men, you’re determined to lay waste those who tried to shatter you. Will you try again?

name: Uncover
description: Uncover is an online fast-paced clue alternative card game

name: Ascend to Zero
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to stop the time? Ascend to ZERO is a time-control roguelike, in which you can use your special ability to stop the time itself and efficiently fight your way through the top. Freeze the time to dodge opponents' attacks using your unique ability, and always hold a higher ground for the combat. However, don't forget that the time allowed for you is confined.

name: Sonic StrikerZ
description:
Welcome to Sonic StrikerZ!
Using 2D Fighter Maker 2022, experience 1v1s, 2v2s, 3v3s and even 4v4 2D chaotic fights across as of right now in this version 27 Zones with 11 characters, including a story/campaign mode with bosses and online!

How you use your power is up to you...
Do not forget your dreams...

name: Zafe's Adventures
description: Zafe's Adventures is a new and simplified 2D platformer game with a simple run and gun elements and gameplay. Inspired by abandonware platformer, Sonic the Hedgehog series and its fangame, Spark the Electric Jester, Jazz Jackrabbit and Freedom Planet and as well with other simple 2D game that was made using GameMaker or Scratch in the past. This has been considered as a small solo indie game project only. The game follows a young and heroic pyrokinetic cartoon humanoid who tries to fight back against evil entities around the hillside wilderness. While he ends up on a long journey through another different world via the mysterious dimension portal.

name: Penelope Pendrick and the Art of Deceit
description: Pick up your magnifying glass as writer-turned-detective Penelope Pendrick in this first-person point and click mystery adventure! Three people have suddenly vanished from the sleepy town of Carlisle. Follow the clues, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to end this case - before it ends you.

name: Haunted House Renovator: Prologue
description: Take the next step in the career of a ghost-fighting renovator in a standalone prologue! Explore the uniquely spooky apartment of a mad painter and discover its many hauntings. Use your tools to overcome the supernatural odds – and bring the location to its former glory!

name: Food Delivery Simulator
description: Live the life of a food delivery driver. Deliver orders, earn money, upgrade your vehicle, explore a vast city, and make way to your success. Dive into a realistic daily adventure and level up to become the best delivery driver.

name: Super Mario Bros. +
description: Sin descripción

name: Patchworld
description: As in other Action RPGs, you have to save the world. But this time there is no need to look for a legendary spell or an artifact created by a great sorcerer of antiquity. You create the spells yourself, and it's up to you to decide what they will be.

name: Chromb
description:
Chromb is a clicker game about... chromb (chromb-chan).

In chromb game you click chromb-chan's ahoge to gain more ahoge which you can spend on things in shop or gain a prestige levels after reaching a certain amount of them.

name: Nova's Adventure
description: After crashlanding on an unknown planet, Nova the Star sets out on an adventure to collect all the parts from his broken ship that was hit by an asteroid while on his way home.

name: Ultreia: Enhanced Edition
description: Experience the mystical world of Ultreïa with the Enhanced Graphics update.

name: Pomeraider
description: Pomeraider's an arcade game heavily inspired by the classic Mario Bros!

name: Rule & Expand
description: A 2x strategy game (exploit and expand). Rule regions to gain money and men. Build armies and expand your empire. Manage your regions carefully or they will rebel against you. Take care of your armies' morale or you will lose control of them.

name: Penn Guiny's Dream Sack
description: After being sucked into a sack full of dreams Penn Guiny lands into an area of the dream realm called "Sunny Shores". With the help of an unnamed cloud lady Penn Guiny learns how to traverse the dream realm.

name: Painter Blazer
description: Painter Blazer is a mix between action, arcade, and light puzzle games. You are playing as Blazer, a bunny who likes to paint. He finds a new job as a painter but the company is no good trying to replace workers with robots. Your job is to paint and blow up the robots and to find who is behind all of this.

name: Bulletombe
description:
In ancient Greece, in the land of Helenia, a young woman who lived in the mountains closest to Olympus was in charge of looking after a mysterious vase inside the temple. One day the vase was making strange sounds and when Pandora went to check on it, the vase burst open and released all the evils that lay within, and along with them, a cherub named Lucy appeared to inform Pandora that this event would cause untold disasters on earth and that it was necessary to recapture them.
Pandora, with great courage and the power of hope that still resides in the vase, decides to travel through Helenia in search of the evils; luckily they are not too far away and the disasters they bring behind them are clearly visible.

name: Nina & Yuri
description: You play Nina, a girl who will need to cross several theater scenes to save her soulmate Yuri.

name: Darkflow
description: Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG that chronicles an epic, universe-spanning saga. Fight your way up from the slums to battle rival alien factions, take down cybernetically enhanced enemies, and discover the hidden powers pulling the strings.

name: Moomi & Spike
description: Experience high-speed thrills and an engaging story in Moomi & Spike, a 3D platformer where agile gameplay and a captivating narrative collide in a vibrant adventure!

name: Men of Conviction
description: Men of Conviction is an original action platformer following the story of Izik Dang, a soldier of the underground rebel group Men of Conviction. Slash your way through four unique stages with a variety of different enemies. Use Chips to harness the power of the elements to assist you in your fight. Can you find the strength to stand against the trials that await you?

name: Man Human Person Thingy's Quest To Get Back The Gun
description:
Criminal stickman gets sent to prison without his trusty weapon, oh what will he do now?!?!??

Man Human Person Thingy's Quest To Get Back The Gun is a silly beat-em-up game that doesn't take itself seriously at all, inspired by flash games of the past!!

name: Lyrestruck
description: This game follows Irina, who's been wandering through an endless forest, in search of an exit. Will she discover the roots of this curse and break out?

name: Lylia's Deadline: Clearance
description: A sequel to the original Lylia's Deadline which features high-speed 2.5D gameplay, low-poly 3D graphics, Rocking music, and more heat-based combat mechanics.

name: Avali: Final Battle
description: Avali: Final Battle is a first person shooter game developed by CL3NRc2 primarily featuring the colloquially known "cute fluffy space raptors"; the "Avali". Originally a creation in SPORE, they rose in popularity because of a mod for the game "Starbound" and even further thanks to models created for VRChat.

name: Lusa the Cathead
description: Lusa the Cathead is an action platformer game where you get to play as a cute cat-head-looking creature named Lusa! Jump your way through the stages, collect orbs and break capsules while avoiding obstacles... and from now on, gathering polymers and megamers to gain score! This game is very customizable, with possibility for not only custom stages, but custom characters with unique mechanics, powered by Lua scripting, free for any modifications!

name: Zombie Cafe
description: Zombie Cafe is a freemium mobile simulation video game created by American Capcom subsidiary Beeline Interactive, Inc. In the game, players run a café by cooking dishes and serving customers with the help of zombies. Players can turn customers into zombies, who become employees. Players gain experience by cooking and serving dishes. There are a variety of menu items, each differing in price, number of servings, and time to cook. As the restaurant builds up savings, the player can purchase recipes and furnishings, and can infect more customers. The player can also purchase pets and expand their restaurant. Along with growing the business, players can send their zombies to raid enemy cafés to obtain new recipes.

name: Little Sound Boxing Champion
description:
Coil, a young lightweight boxer challenges the status quo!
In a world where robots have taken over the boxing scene, Coil must box to the beat in order to take the title of Champion back for humanity in this fun little Rhythm Heaven inspired boxing game!

name: Sonic Freedom Frontiers
description: Sonic Freedom Frontiers is a game that intends to feature many levels, three playstyles, and a longer story. It plans on combining light influence from RPGs with and Platformer inspiration, making it a larger scale game. It has cutscenes that tell of a narrative with a science fiction flavor, that I wrote. It also has two different styles of platforming, one with more emphasis on physics and momentum, the other on combat. If it is completed, it is likely to have five different zones, all with five levels in each of them, with most of them being platformer styled levels. It is meant to feature hub worlds with top down gameplay, NPCs you can talk to, and saving.

name: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Ring
description: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Rings (SFH: KOTR) is a MUGEN-based 2D Fighting Game, which has been in development since 2017.

name: Knight George
description: Knight George is an Action-RPG game in which you play as the titular character in the Kingdom of Earlyne, wielding your trusty sword and many objects to ultimately save the day.

name: Sonic Emerald Madness
description: Sonic Emerald Madness is a boost styled Sonic game that takes its inspiration from Sonic Rush, Sonic Colors and a bit of Mario 64.

name: Sonic Eclipse
description: Sonic Eclipse is a 2D Classic Sonic Fan Game, created by the BrainBox Interactive Team, featured as an entry to this years (2024) Sonic Amateur Games Expo!

name: Sonic Dungeons: Prototype
description: This a concept for a first-person action game set in the Archie Sonic universe. A game where the player explores the open world of Mobius, recruits various freedom fighters to their team, and raids enemy fortresses ran by Dr. Eggman.

name: Sonic Continuity Distortion
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Blossom
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Adventures Revisited
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: Weaving in Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Kane TV: The Game
description: Kane TV: The Game is a tribute game based on the Kane TV channel! Join Kane in his adventure in this cybernetic world, passing through many levels with many references to his YouTube videos!

name: Sonic 2: Rescue Tails
description: Sonic 2: Rescue Tails is a reimagined version of the 8-bit Sonic 2 for the Master system and Game Gear, in the style of the 16-bit Mega Drive/Genesis Sonic games.

name: Sonic & Shadow Black Ice
description:
The story is based on the old fairytale story The Snow Queen.

This will be a story driven game. So there will be no battling. Just moving around, interacting with people and objects while solving simple puzzles.

The game will contain voice acting but only for the main cast. Sonic, Shadow and The Snow Queen.

name: Silver The Hedgehog
description: a 2d Silver The Hedgehog game

name: Sega Brawlers Megamix
description: Sega Brawlers Megamix is a beat'em up style brawler game featuring many of Sega's classic characters and guests from the Sega Genesis days, with a total of 92 playable characters.

name: Rayman Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Project X-treme
description: Project X-Treme is a remake of the cancelled "Sonic X-Treme" made by STI (Sega Technical Institute), which was cancelled in 1996

name: Project After: Shadow Theory
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Aragonite
description:
Pokémon Aragonite is a fanmade project based on the real life island of Sicily, in the South of Italy.
Started by FrankieChatot and Darkonius Mavakar;
This project aim to reimagine Sicily into the Pokémon world by creating the Sylia region, where you will be able to explore many areas and cities based off actual places!
Initially this started as a fakemon dex where we had fun interpreting our culture, flora and fauna into Fakemon, but then we decided to use Pokémon Essentials to turn it into a playable game!

name: PJ the DJ
description: A Parappa the Rapper fan game starring the character PJ Berri

name: Pizza Tower '19 Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Crash
description: Here is a fangame with a mix of Crash Bandicoot and Metal Slug style gameplay. For the most part it's run & gun, so just make sure you survive, especially since there are no checkpoints!

name: Mega Man 1 GM2 Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixcity Swap
description: Mixcity Swap is a fast-paced, competitive mobile card game set in a futuristic sports world, blending strategic deck-building with dynamic real-time gameplay. Two players face off using unique cards, each with distinct abilities and roles. The game’s key mechanic, the Swap, allows players to switch cards during your tunr, triggering powerful effects and shifting the momentum in exciting ways. With an ever-growing roster of sports-inspired cards, frequent updates, and strategic depth, Mixcity Swap offers endless replayability for players of all skill levels.

name: Logan The Kid: How It Was Intended 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Knuckles Quest
description: Knuckles Quest is a continuation of the treasure hunting gameplay style that was present in Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, now with a custom framework and levels. Using a radar, search the area for all the emerald pieces, but be careful: the locations are randomly selected!

name: Klonoa: Project Moonlight
description: Sin descripción

name: Greenmario In Bobbing My Burger
description: A surrealist platformer based on Super Mario and the Amiga demoscene.

name: Flair the Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: EvilBritishGuy's Sonic and The Hedgehogs
description: Sonic and The Hedgehogs reimagines how an Open-World Sonic game should play, Open-World in this context meaning that Sonic is free to go anywhere and do anything that Sonic can and would do. Rather than only rapidly progressing through mostly linear stages to reach a goal miles away from where you start, Sonic makes whatever world he finds himself in his playground.

name: Beavis And Butt-Head In Quest To Score
description: Beavis and Butt-head can't afford tickets to a concert that they want to go to as the tickets are 20bucks and unfortunately they only had 20 cents. With a goal in mind to score and to do things that don't suck Beavis and Butt-Head set off to get $20 to pay for the tickets and to acquire the delicacy known as Nachos as the venue didn't sell it.

name: Azure Plays The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashura The Glitch
description: A Sonic the Hedgehog Metroidvania inspired by the Metroid series and Axiom Verge.

name: Bowser Gets Clever: Insert Subtitle Here
description: This game is half-parody of a Super Mario Bros. game, a reimagining of a really old game made in 2009 by Adrien Dittrick.

name: Sonic 1 Strange Dream World
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Mushroom Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: Suikawa Lead
description: The controller is your voice! An action RPG that can only be controlled with a microphone! Now, use your words to control the "Splitter" and split the watermelon to become the legendary "Guide"! SUIKAWA LEAD is a game that utilizes a voice recognition system.

name: Resident Evil Crossfire
description: Resident Evil: Crossfire was a Resident Evil fan game designed by Thor Steinbach in 2001. Set in Raccoon City during the Raccoon City Incident, it stars gothic high school student Lucrecia Callahan as the primary protagonist, who is caught at the subway station when the outbreak reaches her. At that point she frantically tries to reach her friends' house to save them. The second playable character is college student on leave, Felicity White.

name: Akai Corridor
description:
The first floor is normal.
Please turn right when the floor is normal, and turn left when there is an abnormality.
If you proceed to the 8th floor, your soul will be saved, probably.

2024 Summer Horror Game Creation Project

name: JawshRPG
description: Jawsh RPG is a fangame made for Jawsh and his fans a while ago.

name: Illurama: Masters of Illusions
description:
Illurama: Masters of Illusions it's a bullet hell shmup in the form of a platformer! Inspired by such games like Touhou Project, Dodonpachi, Megaman and more.
Enemies and bosses will shoot projectiles, but beware because they will shoot a TON OF BULLETS.

name: Hotel Hysteria!
description: The evil Dr. Von Gordo has kidnapped Madame Moon! you, Vince Vinchi and your...sidekick Kaizo have to find clues to her location by searching through Dr. Von Gordo's Kooky Hotels!

name: Food Fight
description: You'll have a blast, folks! Come run, jump and fight Jalapenos in Food Fight! This demo is to feature 2 levels and a boss! It also serves as an introduction of what's to come! Our Protagonist, Starla McCormick has found herself at the "Snock Advanced Gay Expo" and out of pure boredom, goes through the eerie catacombs of Gravestone Grease and the cold streets of Freezy Freeze Fields! Are you up for it?

name: Hexachampions
description: Hexachampions is a TCG-tabletop RPG hybrid: every Champion has its unique die and abilities. Your strategy is key, but it will be up to the roll of the dice to dictate what your tools will be. So you always know what to blame in case you lose.

name: Goldio
description: Goldio is about 6 random people who got sent to a different dimension by the villain, Gamebear. The friends have to escape and stop Gamebear from luring more people into his universe, they do this by going through all the different stages of the game to explode Bresh Mountain!!

name: GingerSnap
description: Collect and combine ingredients for a wide combination of moves. Inspired by old N64 era favorites, like Kirby 64 and MegaMan!

name: Garbage Girl Louise
description: Garbage Girl Louise is an indie platformer about breaking down boxes, cleaning up streets, and taking names! Of course, this is done through bouncing on evil moles, magic trash cans, and cardboard boxes, all while tossing anything you can get your grubby trash girl hands on! Save trapped raccoons, meet weirdos around the city, and even race against your ex-girlfriend! Dingy streets! Bubble wrap! Magical eggs! Lesbians! Yeah, we have everything!

name: Frostbite Friends
description: Frostbite Friends is an 80's arcade-style top-down shooter inspired by both niche and classic retro games, starring two snowkids, Mike and Milly, as they venture to rescue the mysterious Dream Stars from the hands of the devious King Guzbum and his assembly of goons!

name: Free Skies
description: Free Skies is a mix of arcade skating and speedy platforming inspired by Jet Set Radio, Tony Hawk, and Sonic.

name: Frebbventure Alliance
description: That's right, the cat came back, and this time, with more. More what? More friends, more enemies, more action, more levels, more bosses, more story. More everything! Frebbventure Alliance takes the formula for a game that prided itself on being jam-packed no-frills action platforming madness, and does it even harder!

name: Foxblade Fable
