description: A young boy is forced to embark on a quest to master the powers of the Divines,

name: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue
description: Firedog: Swooce & Rescue is a momentum-based platformer where you play as a firefighting dog with a powerful firehose. Balance the uncontrollable force of a handheld firehose with the athletic moves of a high-energy Pomeranian as you fight enemies, put out fires, and rescue the good citizens of Dog City. And yes, you can pet the dogs.

name: Dungeon Gals
description: A small polycule-turned-crisis control team been summoned to help a civilization in the sky escape impending doom! Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and find lots of treasure to help prepare yourself for incredible challenges!

name: DreamShock
description: Blast through nightmares, come dreams or reality!

name: GeographyHelp
description:
GeographyHelp is an educational quiz-based game focused on enhancing geography knowledge through interactive learning. The game offers a mix of single-player challenges and Twitch-integrated multiplayer modes designed to test users' ability to recognize countries and geographic features. The theme centers on world geography with a specific emphasis on helping users improve their skills in games like GeoGuessr.

Players engage in a variety of quiz categories that range from flags and country traits to unique geographic identifiers like road signs or language usage. The game features a resource database containing maps and visual aids to assist in learning and memorization. In the multiplayer modes, users can compete in real-time with friends or Twitch viewers making it an interactive experience for streamers and their audiences.

Quizzes are structured with a time limit adding an element of challenge as users are tasked with answering multiple-choice questions based on images or maps. With categories including bollards, license plates, and special letters the game provides a wide array of geography-focused topics. The inclusion of Twitch chat participation allows viewers to collectively take part in quizzes enhancing engagement for both the streamer and the audience

name: Dream Enkoure
description: A not so simple platformer where you go from left to right.

name: Distancy
description: Distancy is a tightly made with passion, tough as nails, Game Boy Color-inspired 2D platformer with various other inspirations! Originally, the game started out small but blossomed into a full team for its creation. Feel the world come to life before your very eyes!

name: Danger Cliff 2
description: Danger Cliff 2 is a very open-ended 2D Platformer inspired by Super Mario 63. Run, jump, and drill through huge, interconnected levels with wild themes, unique mechanics, and branching paths. Between being able to hunt down whatever collectibles you want, taking advantage of deep movement mechanics, and three playable characters to choose from, you decide how you tackle this adventure!

name: CodStar
description: Sin descripción

name: Live Mystery: The Worst Behind the Scenes in History
description: Sin descripción

name: Celestial Soul
description:
Celestial Soul is a 2D game about anthropomorphic fox who's found himself in the middle of somewhere??

He's on a quest in the Void to retrieve the lost shards of his SOUL, which was shattered by his clumsy new friend.

name: Canvas Intruder
description: Canvas Intruder is a game about an artist named Pix who got sucked into the canvas world unfortunately thanks to her apprentice's black magic. goofy. But now its up to Pix to navigate through these canvas levels!

name: Potatostrike
description: A space shmup featuring the ultimate potato-based space fighter.

name: Cain & Iddo: Break Week
description:
The year is 2013. Cain the dog and Iddo the hyena are two plucky 24-year-olds navigating life alone in the East Coast American metropolis of Westside City. Their zany misadventures don't turn out exactly as planned, wacky unforeseen circumstances arise, and hijinx ensues...

Cain works as a barista at the local mall's Starbuzz franchisee. Due to requirements from higher Starbuzz management, his boss Sergio has to give Cain a week off work for the summer. Cain and Iddo have decided to get some bucket list activities done over this week-long break... but you can probably guess that finishing that list is not going to be as simple as it seems.

name: Project: One Bullet
description: Sin descripción

name: Remain on Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Swap Motion
description: Sin descripción

name: Alter Ego S
description: Enhanced version of Alter Ego.

name: Fábulas Porteñas
description: In this game, you'll take control of a character who was riding the subway when it unexpectedly stops at an unfamiliar station named "Pirámides". As you look around, you realize you're alone in this strange place. To find your way back home, you'll need to discover codes, solve puzzles, and explore your surroundings.

name: Brawl+
description:
Brawl Plus is one of the first mods released for Super Smash Bros. Brawl, primarily intended for competitive play, but includes many quality of life features, such as the removal of random tripping and separated character icons for Sheik, Zelda, and the Pokémon Trainer.

It was abandoned following Version 7.0.3 in 2010, with most moving on to the mod's spiritual successor, Project M.

name: Red October
description: A first-person adventure game with a story. You will go to the Soviet city of Pokrovsk. You can walk around the city, talk to residents, solve mysteries and much more.

name: Guess Their Answer
description:
Some people have an amazing ability to read minds. They seem to know what others are thinking of even before they say it. If you are that kind of a person, this game is just for you!

Here you need to guess what the other players answered to a certain questions. It can be anything, so just say the first thing that comes to your mind. Then compare your reply with the answers of the rest.

Play this fun and simple game online and see how many answers you can guess!

name: BuKnight: The Order of the Golden Crest
description: BuKnight is a fun and speedy action-platformer mixing the late '90s era mascot fever with the mid-2000s indie game craze. Use your up-and-downsmash attacks, as well as the special swirling move to hurl pain at your enemies or to change your momentum and dodge their attacks as you zoom past or towards them.

name: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion
description: Bristle and the Artificial Invasion is a platformer game made in GB Studio that tells the story of a paintbrush named Bristle, whose planet is invaded by an army of artificially generated monsters. It's up to Bristle to rescue his friends and save any neighboring planets affected by this catastrophe.

name: Blobl.io
description: Blobl.io: A strategic 2D multiplayer RTS game where you build and defend your base, capture resources, and outmaneuver opponents in tactical gameplay.

name: Black Cat Blitz
description: Welcome to Black Cat Blitz! A game of magic, wonder, and gambling your life away. Play as Nemo (or Mimi if you're a gamer girl rawr) as you try to make the best hand possible by collecting cards, climbing stairs, grabbing chips, and avoiding obstacles. Try playing with a friend in co-op mode! or dont... and be lonely

name: Balloon to the Moon 2
description: Balloon to the Moon 2 is a Semi-Open World Retro Style Platformer inspired by Jet Set Willy. After the First Game, Peter made it to the Moon but is then greeted by the moon's Inhabitants. Which are humans with rabbit ears. The Moon Rabbit Princess offers you to live with them if you can complete a trail to grab all the moon treasures scattered throughout the moon. You will have to navigate several areas to grab all the treasures.

name: Princess Maker: Karen
description: A upcoming Princess Maker game developed by D-ZARD.

name: Astropods: Starside Glaze
description:
Astropods: Starside Glaze is a 2D Fighting Platformer with endless mobility and combat potential! Starring as Hemi and Acro, swap between them at any time to utilize their unique attacks and physics within various environments.

Astropods combines platform fighter combat with platformer styled levels, alongside nonlinear progression and perk customization, to create a dynamic combat-platforming experience unlike anything else!

name: Iter
description: Journey to the Surface - Explore, Develop, Fight, Die… Repeat! Welcome to the frontline! Workers are as expendable as they are useful. Your job is to mine resources, upgrade equipment, defend your base and restore power to the Undercity.

name: Art Attack
description: Art Attack is a 2D side scrolling shoot-em-up with gameplay inspired by Gradius, Silver Surfer, and Cuphead. The aesthetic of each level is based on a different artist or art movement from history.

name: 2-Bit Cowboy Rides Again
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzsoft’s Cooleidoscope
description: Welcome To The Official Puzzsoft Kaleidosocope, a psychadelic bundle of 4 brand new games from everybody's favourite people (JohnLee Cooper, Marty Daniels, Michael Guattery, and Rachel Theil).

name: 02Rhythm
description: 02Rhythm is a rhythm game developed for mobile phones. Inspired by popular rhythm games such as Hatsune Miku: Project Diva and the Persona: Dancing All Night series, it is played by tapping on the screen in the rhythm of the music.

name: My Time at Evershine
description: Be the Governor of a brand-new settlement on the fringes of the Free Cities, facing the almighty Duvos Empire. Recruit settlers, build infrastructure, tame the wilds, and lead your people to become a new cornerstone for the Alliance in this adventure-packed simulation RPG!

name: Plastic Spouse Interrogation
description: A post-human bio-management simulation. In a strange future, you awaken in a plastic body. The authorities question you, but you don't even know what you are. You must quickly grasp this weird world and your place in it, or else face state-sanctioned oblivion.

name: My Dancin' Computer
description:
We are sitting at the computer and everything seems to be going smoothly, but then Virusnya appears! A character who does not have access to administrator rights wants to infect our computer. We can stop this by using my protective dome to protect our files from Virusny's attacks, then charging up Sultan, the Anti-Virus, to defeat that prankster!

This and more will be available in the new game "My Dancin' Computer". This is a rhythm-based game based on "Game & Wario: Pirates" with interesting characters, catchy music, custom OS, and much more.

name: Deception Engine
description: Upcoming heist-themed roguelike deckbuilder by the developers of Chrono Ark. It is said that it will feature a similar combat system, full combat visuals and permanent dungeon progression.

name: Project Reignition
description: Project Reignition is an on-rails platformer developed by KumaPauZ, also known as Kuma. This unofficial remake of Sonic and the Secret Rings, originally developed by Sonic Team and published by SEGA in 2007 for the Wii, aims to reimagine the classic game for modern systems. Built using the Godot engine, this open-source and free project features enhanced graphics, refined controls, and a smoother frame rate, offering a fresh experience while staying true to the original.

name: Final Outpost: Definitive Edition
description: Final Outpost is a survival strategy base-builder. You lead the last survivors of the apocalypse. Assign roles, craft tools, and manage resources carefully. Construct buildings, level up your citizens, and fortify your town against hordes of zombies. How many days can you survive?

name: Portal to the Cosmobeat
description: On his mission, to become the very best dancer ever, Gorb challenges incredible dance coaches all around the galaxy. Unfortunately, he is terrible. Can you dance him to the top?

name: Chorus of Carcosa
description: Chorus of Carcosa is a psychological horror game inspired by the iconic book 'The King in Yellow' by R. W. Chambers. Test the limits of your mind and survive in the old, ever-changing building. Just don't get lost in the dark, twisted labyrinths... or in your own madness.

name: So Much Stuff 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Hunter's Legacy
description: Sin descripción

name: Vigilante Ranger
description: Sin descripción

name: Amer Fighting
description:
Get ready to rumble in Amer Fighting, the ultimate party fighting game where the fun never stops! Gather your friends and dive into an exciting family fight for up to 6 players as each battle is a chance to become a legend!
In Amer Fighting, everyone can fight, but only one can win!

name: Ascendant
description: Sin descripción

name: Hypermarket Simulator Empire 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Yedesna Shoots 2
description: Yedesna Shoots 2 is an asteroids like game where you play as... Yedesna!

name: Stretch Guy
description: Stretch your way to victory in Stretch Guy!

name: Lost in You
description: Take on the role of [REDACTED], an 18 year old senior high school student trying to move on from a rough breakup. Meet new people and cross paths with old acquaintances as you try to build and maintain relationships in the fictional Japanese city of Jakuofo. As you grow closer to everyone they'll start to open up more and you'll soon come to realise that life isn't all fun and games for those around you either. But worry not, the city is your playground to do as you please! Or is it...? Perhaps not everything is as it appears at first... Only time will tell.

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: Halloween Special DX
description: SMBNext: Halloween Special DX is a complete remaster of the original Halloween special, replacing its stages with a wide variety of new ones.

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: The Lost Levels - Part 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. Next: The Lost Levels - Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Tides Odyssey
description: Tides Odyssey is an immersive adventure inviting you to explore mysterious archipelagos. Dive deep into rich mechanics, from straightforward resource gathering to intricate crafting, cultivation, and culinary delights. With each discovery, new biomes unlock, expanding the horizons of your journey.

name: Torq's Late to the Grand Prix in the Attic Upstairs
description:
You're Torq, a toy car... but more importantly, you're running late!

Using your trusty pullback motor and unlockable upgrades, overcome the treacherous terrain of an unkempt living room!

name: Beastkin Training: The Trials of a Beastkin Noblewoman
description: You are a former servant, sold off as an instructor to take care of a Beastkin! Flatter the Beastkin by having chats, gifting presents, and more. Whether or not you can take great care of her is up to you.

name: Hold Me Tight All Night, Onii-chan!
description: Suffering from an illness that he's had since childhood, our protagonist has always struggled to live an independent life. One day his researcher parents get a novel idea for an experiment. Will this experiment finally lead to the cure they've been searching for?

name: One Way Trip
description: Sin descripción

name: Photogeist Albums: Case 2
description: The second chapter of the in-production photography monster tamer RPG "Photogeist Albums".

name: Deflex
description: Sin descripción

name: EvoBots
description: EvoBots is a mobile adventure inspired by classic games of the monster-taming genre. As part of the Ground Expedition Team you will collect a wide variety of mechanical creatures and use them in turn-based battles. To become a real EvoBot expert you have to master the puzzle elements of the five different energy types to gain the decisive advantage in combat. Can you unravel the dark mysteries of the world of EvoBots?

name: Unlich
description: Unlich is a pixel art dark fantasy monster-taming RPG with grid battles, focused on exploration and customization.

name: Scallion RPG
description:
Scallion RPG is a Monster Taming RPG, where you travel the world collect Scallions and battle by transforming into them. With three party members transforming into Scallions at once for a 3v3 battle, your journey is going to be fun and exciting.

Your main goal is explore all region and collect 5 Artifact from Tower Trails and become the ultimate Scallion Master.

You will come along many NPCs in your journey which can join you in and help you in achieving your goal.

name: Risimon
description: Risimon is an adventure & monster-taming game combining an off-the-wall tone with a retro, yet restyled, aesthetic. Experience a hilarious journey across the Issou region. Catch Risimon, train them and fight to prove to yourself that you are NOT a loser!

name: Monster Haven
description: Sin descripción

name: Spam
description:
Explore the different cards and let your imagination run wild to develop an original strategy. Once you're ready for battle, jump into the arena and face players from around the world in a dynamic duel that will require observation and adaptation. Each victory will allow you to earn new cards and expand your possibilities.
Beware, strategy can hide where you least expect it.

name: Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts
description: Battle teams of Abomis in this turn-based roguelike monster-tamer where the matchups change every run! Recruit creatures from several different indie universes to help close the rifts destroying Abomi Nation. Create your own Abomis or download others from Steam Workshop for infinite possibilities

name: Wodopom
description: it's a spaceship management simulation with space and crew combat, planetary visits, anomalous events, quests, and loot! Manage your crew and every aspect of your space vessel to rescue the galaxy from the Greystar!

name: Kawaii Pet Megu
description: Kawaii Pet Megu was a Japanese virtual pet game for iOS devices.

name: A Smattering of Songs
description: Hear a handful of harmonies

name: Rainchaser
description:
Rainchaser is a vertical shoot'em up game set in a world of decaying machines and witches.

Crimson Star, a powerful magical artefact was stolen by a group of six witches. You were sent on a mission to defeat them and return the Crimson Star, with an operator Scarlett as your only help.

name: AMFM
description:
a dimension-hopping & contraption-building game_ anomalous multiverse, Fleeting Machinations_

A biologic supercomputer banished to a lead planet called the "enigma core" awakes from its restless slumber to turn the fabric of reality into an unmaterial broth of pain and suffering. You control a minimum wage school cleaner. Take care of this mess I created.

name: Ice Truckers
description: Welcome to Ice Truckers, where the frozen wilderness becomes your proving ground.

name: Aprenda Libras
description: 'Aprenda Libras' is a game aimed at teaching Libras - Brazilian Sign Language. It's an educational game used for both literacy and basic Libras teaching. It's a light, multiplatform, point-click game with a low degree of difficulty.

name: The Amazing Universe of the Psychotrons
description: Adventure 2D, retro but not pixel art, you are Agent Plotkin and you wander in O'Psy Town to collect the lost neurons of a mad professor overhauled by its own obsessions. He called those PSYCHOTRONS! Jabby and nervous entities o fthe subconscious.

name: Pepsi Nex Game
description: A promotional Flash auto-runner where you must smash walls of ice with well-timed punches.

name: Long War of the Chosen
description: Long War of the Chosen is a port of the original Long War 2 mod by Pavonis Interactive to XCOM 2's War of the Chosen expansion. It is a complete overhaul of the vanilla game that attempts to make campaigns more engaging, longer and more challenging. Overall, you get more tools (items, abilities, soldier class types), but you have to deal with more enemies and a greater variety of enemies.

name: Graft
description: GRAFT splices together tense survival horror with a dark RPG experience in a thrilling new adventure from the developers of BATTLETECH and the Shadowrun Trilogy. Explore a dying world haunted by darkly fascinating characters and nightmarish monsters as you delve into the mysteries of the Arc. Tear pieces from your enemies to transform yourself into something new—something capable of surviving the horrors that prowl around you. Every Graft brings with it some piece of its previous owner’s identity, changing more than just your physical body.

name: Kirby: Wacky Episode
description: A bite-sized fan made adventure is coming your way! Explore those worlds, pull off some new insanely stylish moves and dash through levels at an exhilarating pace! Equip yourself with 2 copy abilities at once and duel with some of Kirby's past foes yet again! Alongside Story Mode, 3 unlockable game modes are now available for players to push their skills to the maximum. This sure is going to be a wacky time you won't wanna miss!

name: The Springlock: Aftermath
description:
In a timeline where Henry's plan has failed...
You're working for a group of investigators who are trying to get rich information about Fazbear Entertainment and their connection with William Afton. Your job is to investigate the old private warehouse of Fazbear Entertainment and save all possible information to the cloud storage. Things get worse when spectral visitors arrive. So, are you ready for the third round?
The Springlock: Aftermath is an FNaF fan-game featuring over 2 hours of gameplay with 10 intriguing main nights and tons of extra content, giving you a genuine FNAF game experience. There is something new to experience every night!

name: Too Many Nights
description: Too Many Nights is a FNaF fangame that doesn't follow the usual 5-night structure normally seen in other games. Instead, it's an endless endurance test where every night you have to pick more enemies, extra penalties, or purchasable shop items to deal with or take advantage of in the future.

name: Wick3r: Cheese, Keys & Speed
description: Join our petty thieving protagonist Wicker on his Wicked adventure about Cheese, Keys and (naturally) Speed, in this 2000s inspired Momentum 3D Platformer with radical levels and a coolness factor off the charts!

name: The Legend of Banjo-Kazooie: The Bear Waker Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Magnet World Final
description: Sin descripción

name: Magi Nation: Keeper's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Andaron Saga: Randomizer
description: Sin descripción

name: Providence
description: Providence is a free-to-play multiplayer co-op survival shooter with a strong narrative, challenging combat, and a unique player-driven economy. Providence is set in a universe ravaged by a catastrophic event known as the Singularity. Players, known as Trailblazers, explore alien worlds, compete for resources and craft items to survive.

name: Wikipedia Speedrun
description: The goal of the game is to navigate from a starting wikipedia article to another one, in the least amount of clicks and time.

name: Everbloom
description: Everbloom is a cute and cozy farming social sim set in a world of whimsy - grow buckets of popcorn right on the plant and make chocolate milk by feeding your cows candy bars. Grow, care, build, decorate, and explore the world of Everbloom solo or with your friends.

name: Zooika
description: Zooika is a casual puzzle game where you match animals in order to create a larger animal. It's a Suika style game with animals, leaderboards, challenges and achievements.

name: Geomancers
description: Geomancers is a PVP card game turn-based shooter where you command powerful elemental magic from a wide array of spells of your own choosing to destroy and create terrain, manipulate your mana and spells, or even summon powerful creatures to fight by your side.

name: Gum
description:
Cursed with sticky autonomy, you play as a Gum Person with a thirst for adventure. Navigate your way out of sticky situations and wonder to yourself how much easier it would be if you didn't stick to everything.

Gum is a puzzle game that I've been working on for a little over a week. It started as a quick idea on paper and quickly proved that it had enough complexity to create a full-fledged puzzle game out of. Feedback is appreciated

name: B-Air Micro
description: Made for #lowrezjam and carried on afterward, B-Air Micro is a roguelike-like in the vein of games like Spelunky. Explore the treacherous caverns deep below the earth and define your aspirations as one of eleven unique classes. Do you have the courage to venture to the bottom?

name: Net.Attack()
description: Unleash your inner hacker skills and code your way to victory in a game where complex algorithms meet intuitive gameplay. Net.Attack() is a dynamic top-down survivor-like roguelite where you create your own abilities with a node-based coding mechanic. Go and dominate the virtual battleboards.

name: Hidey Ducks: Seasons
description: A charming hidden-object game where you find 400 ducks across 8 seasonal scenes. Use your umbrella power to clear obstacles like rain and snow, collect and upgrade stickers for passive income, and unlock upgrades for enhanced gameplay. Optional challenge mode adds extra excitement!

name: Plane Graveyard Simulator
description: Visit the world's largest airplane graveyard and explore the huge desert filled with wrecks. Hundreds of tons of steel and rusted electronics are waiting. Dismantle airplanes, earn money from scrap, and complete tasks from your employer!

name: The Real Face of a VTuber
description: A courtroom investigation visual novel. You play as Prosecutor Justin Truth, investigating a murder at a VTuber agency where that VTuber's real face is the key to cracking the entire case.

name: Home World Run
description: Two baseball playing sisters have been kidnapped by aliens, now they have to use their athletic skills to avoid hazards, solve puzzles, and most importantly bash some slimy creatures to bits in this hand drawn platformer beat-em-up!

name: Cats and Seek: Tokyo
description: The 4th Cats and Seek series is here! We're off to Tokyo to find cats playing all around the city . Can you spot them all?

name: 100 Indonesia Cats
description: 100 Indonesia Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Indonesian themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Indonesia places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 Thailand Cats
description: 100 ThailandCats - Join the cutest adventure in the Thailandthemed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Thailand places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Virtual Pet
description: A virtual pet handheld from Han Cheng.
